description:
When you're puncture is too big for just sealant, reach for this handy kit and avoid an unwanted hike. Add a CO2 canister to this little kit and you have everything you need to patch the hole and get you back riding.

  • Durable aluminum storage case with bottle cage mounting bracket to keep tools handy
  • Includes 5 tubeless repair plugs, plug tool, and Klic CO2 cartridge adapter for presta valves
name: Crankbrothers Cigar Tool Plug Kit and CO2 Head
